me pilibandawa wimasimata maitha්ripala sirisena amathyawaraya sambandha karaganimata gath uthsahaya wyartha wu athara gowijana ekamuthuwe kandawumkaru kawudulle jayathissa mahathagen kala wimasimakadi ohu pawasuwe janadhipathiwaraya gowiyata awanka pa්rakashayak nikuth karanne nam kata wachanayata sima nowi gasat niwedanayak nikuth karannata katayuthu kala yuthu bawaya.

kese wethath adala tharuniya pasuwa sakakaruge sahodariyak wisin mathara bas nawathumpaledi age mawata bharadi athi bawata da wartha weyi.

diwayina pura widuli paribhogika madhyasthana desiyak pamana pawathina athara idiri wasara deka athulatha mema madhyasthanawala paladayithawa ihala nanwimatath thiranaya kara atha.paladayithawa , saha sapalathawa wadi kirima magin widuli paribhogikayin hata labadena sewawa karyakshama kirimata me yatathe salasum kara athi bawa widulibala ha balashakthi amathi patali champika ranawaka mahatha dinaminata prakasha kaleya.widuli upa pola, ha widuli paribhogika madhyasthanawala paladayithawa prawardhanaya sandaha niladharin pirisakda pathkara athi athara widuli upa polawala ayi. es. oo. wani jathyanthara pramithinda athi kirimata thiranaya kara athi bawath amathiwaraya wadiduratath pawasiya..

wigneshwarange ho demala sandhanaye ho koti dayasporawe ho owunge konthraththu bharagena kriya karana des wides wenath kanahilange ho kalakanni sathuta wana prabhakaran saha ema moda thrasthawadiyata dirachcha lanu gilla wu awasthawadi anthawadi parani demala nayakayin dutu dawal sihinaya wana me rata beda wenkara ganime saha sinhalayange ananyathawayan winasha kirime aashawa wana eelam rajyayak, eksath rajyayak anthar palana rajyayak ho balaya bedima wani wenath rajya sankalpayakin baharawa ek dhajayak yata, eekiya ratak yana sankalpaya thula bedumwadi prashnaya wisandanu wenuwata ana gannawa harennata me jathiya hamuwe athi abhiyoga yatharthawadiwa, mathawadiwa saha prayogikawa jaya gannata methek me rata palanaya kala kisidu rajayakata ho nayakayakuta pahadili wada piliwelak nothibu bawa dan pahadiliwi atha.

kumana iganwimakin ho minis chinthanaya samajayata anamya we nam eya sapura adharmayak wana athara shishta samajaya wisin eya prathikshepa karanu labe.kushala’kushala karmayange prathiwipakayanta sapekshawa dharma’ dharmaya winishchaya kirima wina manulowe prathyaksha nowa dewabhutha aashcharyakin siduwana deyak lesa thiranaya kota buddhiyata sima panawimak bududahame kisima thanaka sandahan nowe.sath dharmaya ruchinokarana asathpurushayan; asath dharmayata ha ewan pudgalayantama kamathiwima ha sath dharmayata ha sath purushayanta dwesha kirima lokaye athi pradhanathama gataluwayi.
mokada kiyawanna kammali hithena nisa.
mulu mahath samajayama nawatha aha ara baliya yuthu kalaya pamina athi baw saksudakse pahadiliya.

namuth mama liyana eka mama kawadawath nawaththanne naha.

wruththiya samithi, sangathayanhi ha rajyaye panthi aragalaya yatapath kirime sruju ath lesa parinamaya wimath samaga mema upakramaye jiwyathawaya ahosi wini. 1970 ganan aga wana wita amerikanu palaka panthiya owunage goliya aarthika aadhipathyaya wadi wadiyen ahimiwimata prathichara dakwuye, sapeksha panthi samathaya sandaha wu owunge prathipaththiya awasan karamin saha kamkaruwan dashaka gananawak thisse dinagath prathilabha siyalla nawatha udura ganima sandaha sakalanga sampurna yuddhayak mudaharima magini.
lokaya pura inna prakata prahasana nalu niliyan saha owunge adhyakshawaru me prahasanaya pilibanda nirmanakaranaya handunaganna widihath welawaka prashna karanna siddhawenawa.

mama duwagena ee paththata giya.yanakota ee akka dole eha paththata wela sudu gawumakuth adagena konde kada dagena ana kutu gahagena ekama widiyatata as pillamakwath nogaha dola para diha balan innawa hada eliyath munata watila thiyana nisa muna hodata penawa.ee ara redi hodapu akkama thama eeth muna wiyatu watila thibbe.man eemma palata gin as deka hodata wahan guli wela nidagaththa.udema gedara yanakota gahaka weyo kala irila giya marana danwimak thibba.chuttak muna huruwata thibba nisa baluwa kittu karala.balanakotayi delo rath une me ara maha ra dol laga redi hodapu ganu kena neda kiyala mata eka parama mathak una.ikmanata gedarata giya.gihin ammata wisthare kiwwa.

obagen aarakshawa labu api me rathriye sapa se wesemu.eeta passe nawatha warak athithaye budu wi wadala budun wahanselata namaskara karanawa.ye brahmana wedagu sabba dhamme the me namo the cha man palayanthu namaththu buddhanan namaththu bodhiya namo wimuththanan namo wimuththiyame widihata namaskara karana bosath monara nindata yanawa.
dan meka walan hodanawa.
